price: Wͻ asaase bi a εbεn no so; na wͻn nkoguo no akyi no wͻbɛdi nkonim -
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
